Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. It comes with a range of features that can significantly enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you for $120. This price reflects the value we place on our customers and the commitment to providing exceptional products. I believe you will find it well worth the investment. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
